name: Divine Divide (÷=x)
description:
This game is based on the divine divide.

A division that actually multiplies.

It's like Asteroids or maybe Geometry Wars.

I added effects to feel like an old crt but my own take.

The game progresses as you destroy enemies,

so if you arent destroying them, you're not getting anywhere!

CONTROLS------------

WASD and mouse to play.

press......

2- to change view

3- to turn off effects (for epilepsy)

Q- to reset (when promted )

X- to pause

HOW TO PLAY-----------------

Kill  enemies to spawn new enemies.

Then kill those enemies.

Until you get a big grey enemy, then kill it to get the force field.

THE FORCE FIELD GETS RID OF ENEMIES,

POWERS YOU UP,

AND CREATES THE BOSS AND WHAT LEVEL THE BOSS IS.

The boss can eat enemies and gain levels too.

Defeating the boss powers you up also.

It repeats but gets tougher based on how you play.

To LEVEL up like the PWR stat,you must get 100 PWR parts.

(then more each LEVEL)

You get 1 PWR part per BOSS's LVL .

So ..... a LVL  87 BOSS = 87 PWR parts.

Get other parts by using FORCEFIELD on certain enemies.

Get the HIGHESTSCORE!
